scenario_text.value: Takuma?
Whoa!!!

Oh, it’s just Agumon...
Don’t sneak up on me like that!
I saw you get up and followed you!
What were you up to?

Nothing special. It’s just that yesterday was
pretty intense.

We just wanted to go camping and this rock
creature attacked us.
Gotsumon!

Yeah, Gotsumon attacked. We got away, 
but this school was a spider creature’s lair!
Dokugumon!

It was all so confusing!
I couldn’t keep up with it all.
Really? I thought you did great!

It was touch and go. Even when a friend was
captured, I could only help after Haru’s tip.

Heheheh. Everyone was so scared when he
popped up! Even though he’s no ghost.

You can’t blame them. When I first met
him and his sister, I was surprised, too.

We were exhausted yesterday, but there’s
a lot to think about.
Think about? Like what?
(Right now, we should think about...)
Keeping everyone safe.
The next fight!
What’s happening here.

Let’s start with how to protect ourselves.
Others like Dokugumon could attack again.

Yeah. There are other dangerous ones
out there.

We need a base where we can rest in safety.
It’d be great if we could use this school...

If Dokugumon is not the only one, we need to
figure out some protection.
Leave the fighting to me!

Thanks, Agumon! I’ll also think about how to
make myself stronger.

Unless we figure out what’s happening to us,
I think we can’t expect to get out of here.
Right, but how exactly can we find out?

Exactly. I can’t think of anything myself,
but if we all put our heads together...

Besides, while we wait to be rescued, we
need to figure out food, bath and sleep...
Hmm...
Takuma? You okay?

*sigh* I’m not coming up with anything.
Let’s ask everyone.
You got it! Let’s do that!
